review: The Firestick seemed like a good product except it apparently does not have sufficient memory to ensure continuous streaming. It became so frustrating that we went back to our old ROKU which worked perfectly with no issues.  The Firesticke control is superb, but lack of memory is a deal killer.  Watching a two hour movie takes four hours because it starts and stops.  Don't buy until this is fixed!
